20101208140111.000|20101208140114.333|TR0|Russian embassy officials in
20101208140114.333|20101208140117.667|TR0|London have finally been allowed
20101208140117.667|20101208140121.000|TR0|to contact a young Russian
20101208140121.000|20101208140124.333|TR0|woman, arrested almost a week
20101208140124.333|20101208140127.667|TR0|ago on suspicion of spying.
20101208140127.667|20101208140131.000|TR0|
20101208140131.000|20101208140134.333|TR0|25-year-old Katia Zatuliveter
20101208140134.333|20101208140137.667|TR0|now faces deportation. She
20101208140137.667|20101208140141.000|TR0|worked as an assistant to
20101208140141.000|20101208140143.500|TR0|British MP Mike Hancock, and the
20101208140143.500|20101208140146.000|TR0|UK says she was gathering
20101208140146.000|20101208140148.500|TR0|information on nuclear
20101208140148.500|20101208140151.000|TR0|facilities. The Russian consul
20101208140151.000|20101208140154.333|TR0|is now waiting for official
20101208140154.333|20101208140157.667|TR0|permission for a personal
20101208140157.667|20101208140201.000|TR0|meeting with Zatuliveter. London
20101208140201.000|20101208140204.333|TR0|had refused to provide Moscow
20101208140204.333|20101208140207.667|TR0|with any information about the
20101208140207.667|20101208140211.000|TR0|arrest, and had initially
20101208140211.000|20101208140214.333|TR0|blocked access to the woman.
20101208140214.333|20101208140217.667|TR0|This didn't stop Western media
20101208140217.667|20101208140221.000|TR0|from relishing the Bond-style
20101208140221.000|20101208140224.333|TR0|details of the scandal, however.
20101208140224.333|20101208140227.667|TR0|RT's Laura Emmett looks at
20101208140227.667|20101208140231.000|TR0|Zatuliveter's background.
20101208140231.000|20101208140233.500|TR0|
20101208140233.500|20101208140236.000|TR0|Shes been called a honeytrap,
20101208140236.000|20101208140238.500|TR0|a blonde bombshell, and a
20101208140238.500|20101208140241.000|TR0|Russian spy working at the heart
20101208140241.000|20101208140244.333|TR0|of British government. But who
20101208140244.333|20101208140247.667|TR0|is Katia Zatuliveter?

20101208142111.000|20101208142113.500|TR0|From prospering art centre to

20101208142151.000|20101208142153.500|TR0|
20101208142153.500|20101208142156.000|TR0|The Perm region is full of myths

20101208142204.333|20101208142207.667|TR0|personal with them. The Kungur
20101208142207.667|20101208142211.000|TR0|Ice caves are a few hours drive

20101208142214.333|20101208142217.667|TR0|provide visitors with some awe
20101208142217.667|20101208142221.000|TR0|inspiring views. Normally cave
20101208142221.000|20101208142224.333|TR0|ices grow at certain heights but
20101208142224.333|20101208142227.667|TR0|this particular cave has them
20101208142227.667|20101208142231.000|TR0|right near its mouth. You cant
20101208142231.000|20101208142234.333|TR0|come across this phenomenon
20101208142234.333|20101208142237.667|TR0|anywhere else in the world..
20101208142237.667|20101208142241.000|TR0|It's that uniqueness that has
20101208142241.000|20101208142243.500|TR0|lead to a string of stories
20101208142243.500|20101208142246.000|TR0|becoming attached to the 5
20101208142246.000|20101208142248.500|TR0|kilometre long cave system. The
20101208142248.500|20101208142251.000|TR0|most ancient tale is about the
20101208142251.000|20101208142254.333|TR0|legendary Ataman Yermak who
20101208142254.333|20101208142257.667|TR0|conquered Siberia. He lost his
20101208142257.667|20101208142301.000|TR0|way and had to spend the winter
20101208142301.000|20101208142304.333|TR0|in this cave. Each period gives
20101208142304.333|20101208142307.667|TR0|rise to its own myth. One modern

20101208142317.667|20101208142321.000|TR0|someone who studies caves. Its
20101208142321.000|20101208142323.500|TR0|said that he fell, breaking his

20101208142326.000|20101208142328.500|TR0|colleague. His partner ran off
20101208142328.500|20101208142331.000|TR0|leaving him to his fate. And now
20101208142331.000|20101208142334.333|TR0|the White speleologist wanders

20101208142337.667|20101208142341.000|TR0|traitors. There's also a number
20101208142341.000|20101208142344.333|TR0|of underground lakes within the

20101208142347.667|20101208142351.000|TR0|attached to them. The water

20101208142447.667|20101208142451.000|TR0|dudes, singing a song. Theyve

20101208142504.333|20101208142507.667|TR0|artist events in his life are

20101208142511.000|20101208142514.333|TR0|carving them in 1990s when life

20101208142517.667|20101208142521.000|TR0|Perestroika. They all turned out
